website_summaries.verdict: A massager that may make you feel like you are receiving a professional foot massage any time you use it.
pros: Easy to carry with you in a bag or briefcase
Can be used on the feet, legs, arms and other body parts
Delivers results similar to those associated with a deep-tissue massage
Ergonomically designed to match the contours of the feet
cons: Very rigid in comparison to other massagers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic that easily crumples
customer_reviews.text: Made of cheap plastic barely thicker than a plastic soda bottle. It crumpled and one of the "wheels" rolled off the end with very little pressure. It's made to look like the nice ones I've used with my physical therapist but is just thin cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Frakes

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I have battled with Foot problems for several months. Plantar Fascia issues have plagued me. This item is stellar, and it seems to have done the trick for me. I would highly recommend this to anyone facing the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsman_Schon

customer_reviews.title: SHAPE MATTERS
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the shape of this massage roller I knew it was the one to buy. My only regret is that I spent 45 minutes combing through the others before I saw this one. It works perfectly on every area of the foot. I bought one of those wooden dual massage rollers about 5 years ago and it just didn't do it for me. I've had this one a little over a week and I've used it a dozen times. It's stretching it to say that I used the other one more than a few times. Who cares if you can't do both feet at once if what you're using actually works!
customer_reviews.author: NutritionNut

customer_reviews.title: Great for planter fasciitis and tired feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foot roller along with a couple others to try all of them out. Decided to keep this one as it rolls perfectly, is sturdy and works on the contour of my foot very well. I have planter fasciitis on both my feet and at the end of the day this massager helps and gives great pain relief. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Improved plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hubby because he got plantar fasciitis after her fractured his ankle. His physical therapist suggested he get something like this roller. He has been using it daily and has noticed vast improvement with his plantar fasciitis. He says it hurts when he uses it, es expected. This is a sturdy item that he will hopefully not have to use for much longer...but then we plan on giving it to our puppy who has been eye-ing it since we got it.
customer_reviews.author: PlasticJackie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, doesn't massage well..
customer_reviews.text: I recieved no benefit from this. I have a spicy that I rol around under my feet that feels 100x better. But I have ro focus and control how I maneuver my foot over it. That's why I bought this, thinking all I have to do is test my foot on it and move my leg back and forth. Which is easy and mindless, but the spikes/ grooves on this really doesn't massage the foot. I'll keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Laelle Marjan

customer_reviews.title: ... does what it advertises but I am not completely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: It does what it advertises but I am not completely happy with this purchase. The pressure is very poor. I'm used to being massaged with medium to high pressure. I consider this foot massage roller as light pressure. I know intensity/pressure is highly dependent on me, but if the little nubs on the roller were a little more pronounced, this would be a much better product. Also, after purchasing this I realized I could have bought one that could be microwaved or frozen.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Can use with or without socks
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes simple is best. This foot massager was just what I needed. No fuss - - just took out of the box and start rolling. Arrived quickly, packaged well. I used as soon as it arrived, as I checked my computer emails, ate breakfast, paid bills. I don't have foot issues, except for tired feet at the end of the day. It's sturdy. I use without wearing socks but socks would not hinder its ability to do the job! I also like that it can be wiped down with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Ima Reader

customer_reviews.title: I have had plantar fasciitis twice and this foot foot ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had plantar fasciitis twice and this foot foot massage roller helped tremendously. Not only for the healing process but also to soothe the aches and pains. I wish I had it the first time I went through this misery.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Getchell

customer_reviews.title: Feels great - each day I am able to add additional ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels great - each day I am able to add additional pressure very relaxing afterwards. I have medial plantar fasciitis (manageable with daily stretching exercise) Worth the money spent. Very courteous Seller Prompt delivery and information as well.
customer_reviews.author: McGlamis

customer_reviews.title: Pain reliever... Life saver
customer_reviews.text: I have a knotted nerve in my right foot because of the soccer cleats poor arch support... This helped with it and I am able to roll out the knot and my arches, and the pain is relived... It took a few days, but now I no it after each game and an able to keep the pain away! This thing is so strong it won't break... The knobs are really nice... Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Monkey 5

customer_reviews.title: Fast relief
customer_reviews.text: There was a very noticeable reduction in my foot pain after just the 1st use. I keep it under my "work from home" desk and roll it back and forth a few times throughout the day. It has worked much better than all the other products I have tried combined and it was the least expensive.
customer_reviews.author: R Martin

customer_reviews.title: Helps stretch the plantar fascia
customer_reviews.text: Relatively compact and could be packed easily for travel. It seems to be helping my husband's plantar fasciitis in combination with oofos sandals that provide a lot of support (we live in Florida and sandals are pretty much year-round).
customer_reviews.author: Rio Del Mar

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Too early to tell if it will help my plantar fasciitis, but it certainly "finds" the sore spots so I'll know more after I've used it for a while. And it feels good on the healthier foot. Its nice and easy to use while sitting at my computer working.
customer_reviews.author: Camela Miller

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the only thing that has helped me get rid of my plantar fasciitis pain after long shifts standing up. I have to roll my foot on it for about 20 minutes while I watch TV and it’s like magic.
customer_reviews.author: Evo

customer_reviews.title: Significantly improved my PF after a few days!
customer_reviews.text: This roller did the trick for me. I'm crediting it's hardness and shape with the success in significantly improving my PF. It's important to do stretches also, but this roller makes it possible to put pressure (and stimulation) on hard to reach areas. I noticed improvement after using this twice a day (for 5 minutes on each foot) for a few days. I'm back to running again! I definitely recommend giving this a try if you are struggling with PF and haven't had success with other approaches.
customer_reviews.author: edash

customer_reviews.title: The roller massager really does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the roller foot massager for my mom. She has plantar fasciitis and this new roller massager has really helped to relieve the pain in her arch and her heal.
customer_reviews.author: scott h bailey

customer_reviews.title: Would probably help if the-designed
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Doesn’t feel like I thought it would. Massage nubs could be larger. The massage nubs are really short and close together preventing effective placement on feet to help reduce foot pain
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: It’s one of the most uncomfortable things I’ve ever used. I personally wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: feels good and numbs the pain
customer_reviews.text: feels good and numbs the pain. i have found that a frozen solid bottle of water is a bit better. perhaps they could have a screw cap on one end of this thing to fill with water so you can freeze it and roll on into comfort. ps if they do this i want royalties
customer_reviews.author: tim rutter

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Relieves my plantar fasciitis when it flares up. I would recommend this for anyone with this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rich6973

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is so wonderful. I have plantar fasciitis, and this is really great to use under my desk at work (assuming I wore shoes I can slip off easily). I like it because it works as well as a ball, but it's way more stable - I don't have to think about keeping it from rolling away.
customer_reviews.author: Sullrich

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't take the place of real therapy but does help alleviate minor foot pain. I need to find a better solution though as this is not helping with the morning pain
customer_reviews.author: Prime4Life

customer_reviews.title: Too large for my feet and not helpful
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. This is too hard on my feet. And it is too big. Just not what I expected. Maybe for men's feet it would be more appropriate. Seems like it is built well and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice roller. Well built
customer_reviews.text: Nice roller. Well built. I purchased it for my husband due to plantar faciitis and I use it myself. Makes for a nice foot massage.
customer_reviews.author: cmags

customer_reviews.title: I roll this against my feet and I feel like I'm ready to landscape the following morning
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain about this product. At the end of a shift landscaping, I roll this against my feet and I feel like I'm ready to landscape the following morning. I recommend this product for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher John Millett

customer_reviews.title: Multi Task
customer_reviews.text: The foot roller works really great, and is comfortable to use. I actually have it under our computer desk and can use it and be online at the same time...aka multi tasking. It's does what it's intended for...
customer_reviews.author: NC Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it for anyone that suffers from flat feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this for stretching his aching feet after being on them all day. I highly recommend it for anyone that suffers from flat feet, or Plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: pinkjem84

customer_reviews.title: The massager was a bit harder than I expected but I've grown to really like it and look forward to my daily massages
customer_reviews.text: As a result of being on my feet all day long for work I often have sore feet so decided to give this a try. The massager was a bit harder than I expected but I've grown to really like it and look forward to my daily massages, I even find my roommate using it often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gift as anyone who has an occupation ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a necessity for my golfer boyfriend. Perfect as a gift for anyone who has an occupation that requires standing on their feet all day. I use it time to time as well. It feels the best when you're standing and putting pressure on it. It's cheap, but incredibly effective! Ended up ordering another one to give to my parents.
customer_reviews.author: SVNJ

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for same effect as tennis ball
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Use a tennis ball or pvc pipe. Nothing special about this. Sold it right after I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Whenever my heels starts hurting, i use this and the pain is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lott

customer_reviews.title: Nubs make the blood flow.
customer_reviews.text: I had a foot roller but it was flat and didn't that much for circulation or breaking up sediment. This one does excellently, the size and rubber wheels on the sides keep it from slipping when I'm working on my heel too.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: wake up your feet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's light and easy to carry around. I can use it under my desk at work and it won't rollaway or while I'm sitting on the sofa at home. And they sent me a reflexology chart that is colorful and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: LauraRose

customer_reviews.title: Knots be gone....
customer_reviews.text: Love it....easy to use....rolls the knots from a long day at the office standing o my feet out easily, definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: importceo

customer_reviews.title: Best roller!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this roller. Unlike the balls, large or small, which can easily move sideways away from where you want it to stay. this roller stays course and is much more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Yung Feng

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What My Spouse Needed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was exactly as described. Appeared to be well built.
customer_reviews.author: FireAntFX

customer_reviews.title: Sore feet reliever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item due to plantar fasciitis and tendonitis prone feet. Good quality and can be taken on the go...used for after work outs and the list goes on!
customer_reviews.author: ALICIA THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Had been using a golf ball for my foot but this is much better. Can sit on my chair and use any time. Helping with my plantar facilititus
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rusate

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is good. My only issue with this is that my ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works exactly as advertised and is helping my nasty case of plantar fasciitis. Build quality is good. My only issue with this is that my dog assumed it was her toy from the moment it came out of the box, so we are needing to keep it away from her. :-)
customer_reviews.author: D. Finke

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR PRIZES
customer_reviews.text: WE GAVE AWAY AS A PRIZE AND THEY ASKED WHERE WE GOT THEM!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is just right and feels great. I keep coming back to use it because it really helps after standing or sitting. Easy and light to take wherever. I wouldn't want anything bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a stocking. Stuffed for my husband. He’s been using it every night while watching tv. Highly recommend for arch pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to help relieve pain of plantar fasciitis. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lillie M. Ohlsen

customer_reviews.title: It helps!
customer_reviews.text: I was having lots of arch pain by the end of the day. I use the roller for 10 minutes on each foot every night now and the pain is barely there anymore.
customer_reviews.author: M. W. Gill

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: When I worked in the casino my husband had gotten me the shiatsu massager which was only ok because I have such a high arch but this massage roller is amazing! You just roll your foot while at a desk, sitting on the couch or whatever your doing and it helps soooo much! When my feet are aching at work I wlook forward to going home and using this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Wheels provide grip so roller stays straight
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Wheels provide grip so roller stays straight. Curved design of roller fits arch very well to attack plantar fasciitis related issues.
customer_reviews.author: TxHiFeeback

customer_reviews.title: Numbs are rough
customer_reviews.text: The numbs are very rough-wound up returning it for another brand
customer_reviews.author: anitar

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product for my needs(plantar fasciitis)
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product for my needs(plantar fasciitis). Definitely gives a rigorous massage. Haven't been able to tolerate the 5 minute recommended time of use, or able to stand using barefoot, but does give me relief with a minute or two with sock on foot. Definitely worth giving a try.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Besser

customer_reviews.title: Good Device
customer_reviews.text: I like the curved nature of the device as it fits my foot (the stationary wooden devices are flat and unnatural). The large diameter of this device means that you have to traverse your foot quite a distance across the floor. It would be better if it were stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: a littel too prickly, but works.
customer_reviews.text: for those with sensitive feet, the bumps will be too much without socks. would prefer if the side-wheels were wider so they could be used as the smooth part
customer_reviews.author: matt.lind

customer_reviews.title: Foot Massage Roller
customer_reviews.text: I found this item a little bit too prickly for my feet. I wish they had made it from hardened rubber, instead of plastic. May be I would buy it again. But this plastic one can last for ever though, so I gave it 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Volleny Bamutta

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it works ok but i feel like i need to push real hard to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: rattiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Helps a lot with foot pain caused by plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great foot massager
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Christmas and I love it. It is very firm and feels great on my feet after running or being on my feet all day. Especially feels good on my heels and arches.
customer_reviews.author: Javajane

customer_reviews.title: Gentle massage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. You just have to be careful as it is bards and doesn’t have a lot of give.
customer_reviews.author: Funtime

customer_reviews.title: Good for my PF; Daily use
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for foot massage. I use post run and at least once daily. It has kept my PF at bay. I'm a heavier weight runner and this is good for caring for my feet. Don't push hard on it and give your feet a week or so to get used to the nubbies. Wear socks if you prefer. I love this gadget.
customer_reviews.author: SweetB

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The roller is good enough for people with sensitive feet & need a decent massage at the end of the day. It does the job fairly well, only gripe I have is if they were able to make the bumps more rough & not as glossy so the roller has a better grip when the foot rolls over it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Silvouplait

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This foot roller is sturdy, good for 13 3E foot size, and helps elevate pain from plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I would like to be able to write a review, but this foot massage roller was a Christmas gift for my son who is a runner. I'm sure he likes it since he was going to purchase one for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: Foot pain gone. I have dealt with foot pain for many years. Orthotics, expensive shoes, stretching, several foot rollers, but none have worked as well as this roller. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CALI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This roller beats all hands down. I was using a tennis ball for my planter fasciitis but it didn't really help. This roller did the job! I use it when I'm sitting watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: JoseR

customer_reviews.title: love this roller
customer_reviews.text: love this roller...amazingly help with the plantar fasciitis pain within a day. especially like that it is very easy to wash too. On time delivery and instructions sent with item. A+
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly Mama

customer_reviews.title: Super foot massage
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this foot massager since it arrived and I really like it. It has helped to work on the bottom of my foot and relieve the pain of plantar fascitis. My husband also uses it to help his tired feet at the end of a long work day. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ostien

customer_reviews.title: Great price too
customer_reviews.text: I had foot surgery and the tendons still tighten up... this really helps roll out knots and loosened them up! Great price too!!!
customer_reviews.author: S L.

customer_reviews.title: Foot the bill
customer_reviews.text: This is better than those foot bath gadgets that are supposed to offer relief. While I would like to see the beads a little less harsh it works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Ford guy

customer_reviews.title: Love this massager
customer_reviews.text: Great, simple massager. I use this in the morning to "wake up" my feet, and at night after work. Does it's thing, built well, doesn't scuff the floor.
customer_reviews.author: NickP

customer_reviews.title: Great for folks who walk/stand all day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who walks all day in a hospital. He loves the foot massager. No complains so far from him. I tried it, but didn’t care for the bumpy texture of the roller.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda V

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME. Comfortable to use, effective. I have one at home and one in my office.
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my plantar faciitis which was waning somewhat, but now is all but gone after one week! I roll my foot on this roller, and it gives a good foot massage/relief.
customer_reviews.author: W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really happy with this. There is no weight too it. And find it difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: peterpain82

customer_reviews.title: Works better than braces and compression socks
customer_reviews.text: The most effective way to moderate the pain from plantar fasciitis. Works better than braces and compression socks. Use twice a day for five minutes each and pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: The Scot

customer_reviews.title: Pain begone, roll away.🎶
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this tool. It gives me great relief!

customer_reviews.title: I have Plantar Fascitis, so i use this on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have Plantar Fascitis, so i use this on my foot to roll out the pain and it works for me :)
customer_reviews.author: daisygirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this foot massager because I'm working through plantar fasciitis. It is a great product that I use at home and can easily take with me to work to use during the day or anywhere else I go.
customer_reviews.author: Gecko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for use under my desk. It doesn't roll away as tennis balls do. It can also massage both feet at once using the edges without harm to the feet. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gr8 product, durable, relaxes and stimulates the foot. I've got major foot problems and this really does help.
customer_reviews.author: TMalecki

customer_reviews.title: Foot Massage Roller for Plantar Fascilitis
customer_reviews.text: I love using this foot massage roller by Natural Chemistree! My aching feet feel much better after using this roller and my plantar fasciitis seems to be helped after only several weeks of usage (approx. 15 min a day). Excellent customer service also"
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: Helps relieve some of the tightness when used regularly. I find it works fine for me with and without socks.
customer_reviews.author: willicky

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised and pleased with the effectiveness that using the roller was in ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not a total cure, however, I was surprised and pleased with the effectiveness that using the roller was in relaxing my arch and giving me some pain relief. plus it is convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: foot massager
customer_reviews.text: I love my foot massager. It helps to relieve my foot pain from plantar fascitis. this is a great product
customer_reviews.author: cheryl campo

customer_reviews.title: Worth a Try
customer_reviews.text: My husband says this is just like getting a foot massage. It helps with his extreme foot pain

customer_reviews.title: ... buying a new pair of workout sneakers with exceptionally crappy arch support
customer_reviews.text: After buying a new pair of workout sneakers with exceptionally crappy arch support, I developed pain and tightness in my arch and heels of my feet. After weeks of being in pain, this roller helped a lot. It hurts a lot when using it, but it appears to loosen up what it's supposed to.....
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little larger than I expected and it's quite firm (no give at all while you roll - like foam roller would have), but bought as a gift and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: CLATL

customer_reviews.title: Relieves Pain
customer_reviews.text: I recently started to suffer from plantar fasciitis. I decided to try this based on the reviews. This gadget feels awesome and definitely soothes the pain in my foot. I keep it next to my bed so that I can use it first thing in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Bbouch

customer_reviews.title: He likes it,he really likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend of my husband , the gentleman said it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: JSP

customer_reviews.title: I started using this for a week and it does ...
customer_reviews.text: I started using this for a week and it does help. Will need to continue using it diligently for it to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsy

customer_reviews.title: Sore feet rejoice!!
customer_reviews.text: Feels good on my sore feet. I do one foot and sometimes both feet together, rolling back and forth. It's very sturdy and since it has ends my feet stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Good for getting knots out of my feet
customer_reviews.text: I take several classical ballet classes a week, and am over 50 (Don't think too hard about this. I don't do pink.) So its hard on my feet and I get a lot of foot cramps. This foot roller does a good job of working some of the knots out. The little nubs are too painful for me, so I wrapped the roller in a thick white sock. Now it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought it. Keep it by my bed and use it a few minutes morning and night; easy peasy. Gentle or hard pressure; I choose. Wish I'd had it back when the plantar fasciitis was at it's worst!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Great way to treat plantar problems in the heel. It is a 'good hurt' at first, then brings relief. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the foot massager
customer_reviews.text: All of the products work nicly. I really like the foot massager.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not fancy, but does make my feet feel great after a long day. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Heal But Relieves Foot Pain
customer_reviews.text: Both wife and I suffer from a variety of foot ailments, plantar fasciitis, sore heels, etc. This massage roller does not necessarily heal or solve the problem, but the gentle stretching and bumpy rolling surface seems to provide some relief. Would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A. LoganbillTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Wortht he money!
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to feel good on my hurting foot but I was very surprised that the pain actually went away after only using this for a week. Wortht the money!

customer_reviews.title: Great for massager
customer_reviews.text: This foot massager is great. I can't believe the quality of this massager and it's just a perfect fit for my feet.

customer_reviews.title: ... trainer - but the Natural Chemistree delivers a far better massage due to the shape and texture
customer_reviews.text: Tried two other foot massage rollers lent by an exercise trainer - but the Natural Chemistree delivers a far better massage due to the shape and texture. Very satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product meets my expectations. It really helps with plantar fasciitis.

product_meta.title: Foot Massage Roller for Plantar Fasciitis, Heel & Foot Arch Pain Massager Relief. Stress and Relaxation, Through Trigger Point Therapy by Natural Chemistree
feature_bullets: Nubs recreate acupressure effect of deep-tissue massage to aid pain relief from plantar fasciitis. Perfect physical therapy device
Massage for tired achy feet. Ergonomically contoured roller for full contact with sole of the foot
Keep your socks on for a gentle massage, or go barefoot for an intense massage to treat heel spurs. Can also be used to massage legs, wrist, shoulder and neck
Handheld device, take your foot roller to work and on trips in a briefcase or carry-on bag.
1 year satisfaction guarantee or your money back. Buy now RISK FREE
